description: The lobby of the La Guardia Airport Marriott was full of stranded tourists and locals who came to the hotel to ride out the impact of Hurricane Sandy.
title: Stranded by the Storm
title_page: Stranded by the Storm - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The lobby of the La Guardia Airport Marriott was full of stranded tourists and locals who came to the hotel to ride out the impact of Hurricane Sandy.
